00023 #include "chipstream/EngineUtil.h"
00024 #include "chipstream/apt-probeset-genotype/ProbesetGenotypeEngine.h"
00025 #include "chipstream/apt-probeset-summarize/ProbesetSummarizeEngine.h"
00026 #include "dmet/DmetCopyNumberEngine.h"
00027 #include "dmet/DmetEngine.h"
00028 #include "util/AptVersionInfo.h"
00029 #include "util/BaseEngine.h"
00030 #include "util/Fs.h"
00031 #include "util/LogStream.h"
00032 #include "util/PgOptions.h"
00033 #include "util/Util.h"
00034 
00035 //
00036 #ifndef WIN32
00037 #include <unistd.h>
00038 #endif /* WIN32 */
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042 /** Everybody's favorite function... */
00043 int main(int argc,const char* argv[]) {
00044   ofstream logOut;
00045   LogStream log;
00046   string logName;
00047     
00048   try {
00049 
00050     DmetEngine engine;
00051     
00052     const string version = AptVersionInfo::version();
00053     const string cvsId = AptVersionInfo::cvsId();
00054     const string versionToReport = AptVersionInfo::versionToReport();
00055     const string execGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00056     
00057     /* Parse options. */
00058     engine.setUsage("apt-dmet-genotype - A program for analyzing DMET 3.0 CEL files. \n\n"
00059                     "usage:\n"
00060                     "   apt-dmet-genotype ... \n");
00061     
00062     engine.parseArgv(argv);
00063     Verbose::setLevel(engine.getOptInt("verbose"));
00064     const string progName = Fs::basename(engine.getProgName());
00065     engine.setOpt("command-line",engine.commandLine());
00066     engine.setOpt("program-name",progName);
00067     engine.setOpt("program-company","Affymetrix");
00068     engine.setOpt("program-version",version);
00069     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id",cvsId);
00070     engine.setOpt("version-to-report",versionToReport);
00071     engine.setOpt("exec-guid",execGuid);
00072     if(argc == 1) { engine.setOpt("help","true"); }
00073     
00074     // Check Options. Will print out version/help if requested then exit.
00075     engine.checkOptions();
00076 
00077     engine.openStandardLog("apt-dmet-genotype.log",logOut,log);
00078     
00079     engine.run();
00080   } 
00081   catch(...) {
00082       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00083       // Close log files
00084       logOut.close();
00085       return 1;
00086   }
00087   // Close log files
00088   logOut.close();
00089 
00090   return 0;
00091 }
